summary: An ordinance refunding to Roger S. Greene, the sum of $11.34, being the amount of the 5th installment against lot 2, block 2, and lot 24, block 12, Brooklyn Addition, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast, in Local Improvement District No. 604, authorized by Ordinance No. 8163; said installment became delinquent and was certified to and collected by the County Treasurer and subsequently paid again in error to the City Treasurer.
